TestCase.name: query 1
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_no_count as select sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_no_count]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($1, $0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], v=[SUM($0)], Row Sum0=[$SUM0($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($1, $0)], Row Count=[$1]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], v=[SUM($0)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: query 2
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_no_group_has_count as select Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_no_group_has_count]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[$SUM0($0)], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($0)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1])

TestCase.name: query 3
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_has_count as select v2, Count(*), Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_has_count]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($1, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[$SUM0($1)], v=[SUM($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], EXPR$1=[$1], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($1, $2)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$1=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: query 4
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_group_no_count as select v2, Sum(v1) as V from t group by v2

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_group_no_count]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], v=[$1]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($2, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], v=[SUM($1)], Row Sum0=[$SUM0($2)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v2=[$0], v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($2, $1)], Row Count=[$2]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], v=[SUM($1)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v2,v1])

TestCase.name: query 5
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_has_three_group as select v1, v2, v3, Sum(v1), AVG(v2), COUNT(v3) as V from t group by v1, v2, v3

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_has_three_group]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($5, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0, 1, 2}], EXPR$3=[SUM($0)], EXPR$4=[AVG($1)], v=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1, 2]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3])

TestCase.name: query 6
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_one_group_avg as select v1, avg(v3) from t group by v1;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_one_group_avg]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], EXPR$1=[/($1, $2)]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[<>($3, 0)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[SUM($1)], agg#1=[SUM($2)], Row Sum0=[$SUM0($3)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(v1=[$0], $f1=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($3, $1)], $f2=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($3, $2)], Row Count=[$3]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{0}], agg#0=[SUM($1)], agg#1=[COUNT($1)], Row Count=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v3])

TestCase.name: query 7
TestCase.Resource: create materialized view T_one_count_star as select count(*) from t;

RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t_one_count_star]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[$SUM0($0)]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamProject(EXPR$0=[$0]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], EXPR$0=[COUNT()]) RwStreamExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,v3])
